hackathon-description-text: The AT&T Entertainment App Challenge invites developers, designers, and creators to hack the way we create and experience entertainment. Are you interested in developing mobile apps for the second screen, or working with technologies like AI, VR/AR/MR, IoT, or robotics to disrupt content consumption? Then, this challenge is for you. When submitting your entry, we encourage you to consider all scenarios in entertainment such as monetization, social, accessibility, immersion, virtual assistants, usability, e-sports, or whatever your passion. Join us!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winner of this prize will receive $20,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.
The winner of this prize will receive $10,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.
The winner of this prize will receive $5,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.
The winner of this prize will receive $2,500 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.

The top five (5) submissions will be awarded an trip for two (2) to the AT&T SHAPE Tech & Entertainment Expo in Los Angeles, California June 1st, 2018 through June 4th, 2018 including Airfare, three (3) nights hotel at Loews Hollywood Hotel and $400 in VISA Giftcards.
The winner of this prize will receive $5,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.
The winner of this prize will receive $5,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Next Generation Advertising or Distribution Solution

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winner of this prize will receive $5,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Gaming, VR or AR Technologies in Storytelling

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winner of this prize will receive $5,000 in cash split evenly between members of their team or awarded to their organization as a whole.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Provide a succinct and clear description of what your app does both in your written description and in your video demo.
How original is the solution you created? How does it differ from what is already in the market place?
How technically difficult is the solution that you created? What technologies were used to create your entry?
How interesting and polished is the design of the user interface? How intuitive and well thought out is the user experience?
How well does the submission comply to the entertainment theme? Does it fit well into one of the categories of focus?

hackathon-description-header: AT&T is challenging developers to submit recent Entertainment solutions, including games, or hack new entertainment solutions.
